item.title: Data Visualization With R - Bar Plots
item.description: Introduction This is the fifth post in the series Data Visualization With R. In the previous post we learnt how to build line graphs. In this post, we will visualize categorical data using univariate and bivariate bar plots. create simple bar plot stacked bar plot grouped bar plot modify bar direction color line color width labels modify axis range remove axes from the plot specify the line type of the X axes offset the Y axes modify legend
